column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thanks Malnati's for catering our son's graduation party! We are from NYC
column2: so a bit snobbish about our pizza. We had malnati's provide several deep dish pies
column5: some baked pasta dishes for a few pizza-haters
column6: and an array of Italian cookies for dessert. They guided me through the order process
column7: showed up at the hotel on time
column11: excellent service. The pizza was piping hot
column12: I don't know how they did it. The salad was cool and crispy. And the price was reasonable. I highly recommend their catering service.
